title: Nordstrom’s Fall Sale Has Landed — Here Are The 24 Best Fashion Finds
description: Fall is the perfect time to rethink your style direction. After all, the change in temperature calls for a switch in fabrics, silhouettes, and even mood. It’s also an opportunity to stock up on wardrobe must-haves or experiment with a trend you’ve been eyeing, especially with all the seasonal sales. One of the most anticipated ones is Nordstrom’s. The retailer recently rolled out its Fall Sale, and it’s brimming with the best runway-approved fashion trends, including knee-high boots, metallic sneakers, and cardigans — all up to 60% off.There's truly no time like the present to round out your seasonal wardrobe with these discounted items. If, however, you're feeling overwhelmed by the deluge of quickly-selling pieces, don't worry: We’re here to help. Ahead, we've compiled the best Nordstrom deals across women’s fashion — from Refinery29 reader-favorite brands like Free People, Good American, Petal & Pup, and more — that we think are worth adding to your cart ASAP, before the sale ends on October 28.All linked products are independently selected by our editors.
